document.full_text: an apparent attempted bombing at a littleton shopping mall likely was not related to the 12th anniversary of the shootings at nearby columbine high school, the f.b.i. said monday.
document.title: rockies: colorado: link to columbine dispelled
lines_and_colors: an apparent attempted bombing at a littleton shopping mall likely was not related to the 12th anniversary of the shootings at nearby columbine high school, the f.b.i. said monday.
